body.name: 6-Tier Bookshelf, Narrow Bookshelf, Industrial Bookcase with Open Shelves, Tall Book Shelf for Living Room, Home Office, Study, Bedroom, 11 x 15.7 x 72.5 Inches, Rustic Brown and Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 23 mins
features: [Suitable for any scene] In the living room can be used as a display shelf to put decorations, green plants, photo frames. In the study, it can be used to put books and printers. In the kitchen, it can be used to put cooking utensils. In the bedroom as a garment rack. In the garage as a shelving unit, also can be used as a utility shelf.
[Stable and load-bearing] The back panel not only provides structural stability, but the connection between the back panel and the laminate also ensures that each layer can bear 25lbs of load.
[Designed for small spaces] Provides 6 levels of use in a footprint of 40cm (15.7 inches) wide by 28cm (11 inches) deep, which greatly improves space utilization.

[Easy to install] The structure is simple and easy to assemble, reducing the variety of parts and components at the same time for each type of screws as a spare, thus ensuring a smoother installation.
[Safer and more reliable] Four adjustable feet to ensure that the shelf is more stable, while the two anti-tipping belt also ensures the safety of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a similar piece from crate and barrel I paid hundreds for. This bookcase is shorter, but just as nice and fits in a very narrow space. I am truly delighted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shelving unit fits perfectly in a small space in our kitchen and holds some heavy appliances, and looks great! It was easy enough to put together and is very sturdy. This is exactly what we were looking for, and it makes our tiny kitchen area look so much tidier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed!!
reviews.reviewText: This shelf was easy to put together and it took me about 15-20 minutes. Once put together it looks great. It has given a space in my office Life. It is sturdy, it looks as described, and is reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf definitely is a space saver! Its industrial design and narrow profile fit perfectly in our space. The open shelves are great for displaying books and decor. Assembly was straightforward, and the quality is excellent. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a stylish and space-saving bookshelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tall and narrow shelf for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: The height of this shelf is what caught my attention.It’s fairly sturdy and took a long while to set up since each shelf has about 6 screws to it. I like that there is a small “back” for each shelf so items cannot fall behind the shelf. It comes with an attachment to the wall for safety.I think it’s possible for one person to set this up, but was a lot of work even for two people. Especially since I couldn’t find the drill, so we did everything by hand.No surprises here. It looks exactly as described in the photos and description. The instructions were clear to understand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: You can never go wrong with having more storage and places to put things down on. This shelf gives you a LOT more room! I was surprised at how easy it was to build; all the holes lined up and were cut well enough. The shelves are sturdy, and even after loading this towering shelf full of things I'm happy to say it's not budging! Rustic Brown is exactly as advertised and will pair nicely with any farmhouse/rustic themed homes. It's simple and pretty, can't recommend it enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tall sturdy shelf
reviews.reviewText: I needed a shelf unit for my figures since I left behind 5 Detolfs in my previous apartment. While it doesn't have a glass enclosure it is definitely taller offering 5 shelves to place figures. I have to admit, I ordered this with not too much expectation. However, I was pleasantly surprised. It took me around 20 minutes to assemble and all the shelves are nice and sturdy. My heaviest figure weighs around 9 pounds and I have it on the top shelf. With nothing else in it but that figure the unit never felt as if would tip over. I appreciate that all the shelves have back stops to prevent stuff falling down behind. I'm looking forward to ordering the wider version and another narrow version when I get the chance. It really does look nice and the price is right. Good job, recommended 👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tall and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I'm pleasantly surprised--I have this sitting on the carpet and it doesn't sway at all. It is very tall and has yet to even hint at tipping--this is while it's still empty. With the open sides, you will definitely need bookends if you do plan on using it as a bookshelf. I will be using it for mostly decor and a couple of books laid flat. Easy and quick to put together with all needed tools included.
